title: Henry IV. Part II. An Introduction: act II scene II, act V scene V
creator_credit: Peter Seabourne, Seabourne Enterprises and Anvil Films
brief_description: Part of the New Shakespeare series. An enactment of Shakespeare’s Henry IV without commentary focussing on two specific scenes. Made for educational use.
